My Education

My degree, courseworks, and projects in the university

BACHELOR'S OF ENGINEERING

I am studying in the final year at the department of Industrial Engineering. You can check out my resume here.

COURSEWORKS

    Statistics: Regression Analysis, Time-Series Analysis, Design of Experiment, Hypothesis Testing, Descriptive Statistics, ANOVA

    Programming Languages: Python, R, SQL, JavaScript, HTML (+CSS)

    Machine Learning: Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning

    Data Analytics: Data Mining, Data Visualization

    Operations Research: Linear Programming, Integer Programming, Shortest Path Problem



You can check out some of my projects below.

Bank of Thailand

Data Analyst Intern

While I was working there, I participated in the Telecommunication export value forecasting project. Telecommunication products play a huge role in stabilizing Thailand's economy, with it's value ranked between the top 10 sectors with highest export in the country. My task was to predict the export value of this sector using two forecasting methods, Time-Series forecasting and Machine Learning algorithms using the import value of relevant parts used to produce the items in the sector. Then all results were compared.

Chulalongkorn Alumni Mentorship Program (ChAMP)

Organising Committee (OC)

ChAMP is the project created to connect the current engineering students to the alumni, ranging from those who were recently graduated to CEOs, Presidents, etc. I am working as an OC. My job is to plan and schedule events, recruit staffs, track mentees (participators), and cooperated with mentors.

FECamp

Academic Director

The Fundamental Engineering Camp (FECamp) is a project by a group of engineering students aiming to teach high-school students who want to apply to the engineering path in the bachelor's level. I was working in the academic squad, being a head of the team. My job is to train the new generation of teachers (university students, should I say?) about techniques, knowledges, and core values of the camp. I also planned the working schedule, set the objective, and taught high-school students.
